document.full_text: a surge in income tax receipts helped cut the u.s. monthly budget deficit in half in april compared to a year ago, figures issued by the treasury department on wednesday showed.
document.title: april budget gap narrows sharply from year ago
lines_and_colors: a surge in income tax receipts helped cut the u.s. monthly budget deficit in half in april compared to a year ago, figures issued by the treasury department on wednesday showed.
